channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunt With Me
channel.desc: Nore Martin catches up with Martin Cleave as they head to the Mokohinau Islands, while the Clarke boys have timed their hunt well in the middle of the annual stag roar. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Haututu Hunters
channel.desc: Four city slickers get out of their comfort zones and connect with their whenua and wh?nau. The Hautut? Hunters go international and visit Kaina Makua on the island of Kaua'i. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Hunting Aotearoa
channel.desc: We are welcomed by Tiki?s family, who fill us in on his his background and his passion for hunting starting with pest control in Rotoiti.
